content:
I am getting these validation errors when using '|n.n.n' for canonical url in my capability statements.
The syntax looks correct to me. 

CapabilityStatement/consumer-client: CapabilityStatement.text.div   error   The URL http://hl7.org/fhir/us/qicore/ImplementationGuide/hl7.fhir.us.qicore|4.0.0 is not valid (URL contains Invalid Characters ([|]))
CapabilityStatement/consumer-client: CapabilityStatement.text.div   error   The URL http://hl7.org/fhir/us/cqfmeasures/ImplementationGuide/hl7.fhir.us.cqfmeasures|2.0.0 is not valid (URL contains Invalid Characters ([|]))

The Capability statements can be found here: https://github.com/HL7/davinci-deqm/blob/master/input/resources/capabilitystatement-consumer-client.json
